elements.name: Create a permanent placement with funding type as Funded and funding model as Direct, reviewed and approved by internal users on behalf of external users

steps.name: login as Onboarding agent Maker user
navigate to the permanent placement list page
permanent placement details
select the respective currency for the permanent placement
select the funding type as "Funded" for permanent placement
select the "Direct" model agency in the permanent placement form
select the "Direct" model client in the permanent placement form
fill the placement details in the permanent placement form
Insert the purchase order number in the permanent placement contract if required
Submit the permanent placement for credit risk approval
login as Credit Risk Manager user
navigate to the permanent placement list page
select the respective permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement credit limit by credit risk manager user

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 80000ms: Expected to find element: `[data-component="Organisms: Info"]`, but never found it.
    at Context.eval (cypress/pages/PermanentPlacementPage.js:20:19)

steps.name: login as Onboarding agent Maker user
navigate to the permanent placement list page
select the respective permanent placement
Upload the agency proof for agency approval-rejection for permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement by internal user on behalf of agency user
Upload the client proof for client approval-rejection for permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement by internal user on behalf of client user
"Direct" model Invoices for the "Funded" permanent placement will be generated

elements.name: Create a permanent placement with funding type as Funded and funding model as Indirect, reviewed and approved by internal users on behalf of external users

steps.name: login as Onboarding agent Maker user
navigate to the permanent placement list page

steps.name: permanent placement details
select the respective currency for the permanent placement
select the funding type as "Funded" for permanent placement
select the "Indirect" model agency in the permanent placement form
select the "Indirect" model client in the permanent placement form
fill the placement details in the permanent placement form
Insert the purchase order number in the permanent placement contract if required
Submit the permanent placement for credit risk approval
login as Credit Risk Manager user
navigate to the permanent placement list page
select the respective permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement credit limit by credit risk manager user
login as Onboarding agent Maker user
navigate to the permanent placement list page
select the respective permanent placement
Upload the agency proof for agency approval-rejection for permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement by internal user on behalf of agency user
Upload the client proof for client approval-rejection for permanent placement
Approve the permanent placement by internal user on behalf of client user
"Indirect" model Invoices for the "Funded" permanent placement will be generated
